4 module prg_modelham_mod
5 
6  use bml
7  use prg_kernelparser_mod
8  use prg_system_mod
9 
10 
11  implicit none
12 
13  private !Everything is private by default
14 
15  integer, parameter :: dp = kind(1.0d0)
16 
18  type, public :: mham_type
19  integer :: norbs, seed
20  character(100) :: jobname
21  character(100) :: bml_type
22  real(dp) :: ea
23  real(dp) :: eb
24  real(dp) :: dab
25  real(dp) :: daiaj
26  real(dp) :: dbibj
27  real(dp) :: dec, rcoeff
28  logical :: reshuffle
29  end type mham_type
30 
31  public :: prg_parse_mham, prg_twolevel_model
32 
33 contains
34 
36  subroutine prg_parse_mham(mham,filename)
37 
38  implicit none
39  type(mham_type), intent(inout) :: mham
40  integer, parameter :: nkey_char = 2, nkey_int = 2, nkey_re = 7, nkey_log = 1
41  character(len=*) :: filename
42 
43  !Library of keywords with the respective defaults.
44  character(len=50), parameter :: keyvector_char(nkey_char) = [character(len=50) :: &
45  'JobName=', 'BMLType=']
46  character(len=100) :: valvector_char(nkey_char) = [character(len=100) :: &
47  'GetModelHam', 'Dense' ]
48 
49  character(len=50), parameter :: keyvector_int(nkey_int) = [character(len=50) :: &
50  'NOrbs=', 'Seed=']
51  integer :: valvector_int(nkey_int) = (/ &
52  10, 100 /)
53 
54  character(len=50), parameter :: keyvector_re(nkey_re) = [character(len=50) :: &
55  'EpsilonA=', 'EpsilonB=', 'DeltaAB=','DeltaAiAj=','DeltaBiBj=','Decay=','RCoeff=']
56  real(dp) :: valvector_re(nkey_re) = (/&
57  0.0, 0.0, -1.0, 0.0, -1.0, -100.0, 0.0 /)
58 
59  character(len=50), parameter :: keyvector_log(nkey_log) = [character(len=50) :: &
60  'Reshuffle=']
61  logical :: valvector_log(nkey_log) = (/&
62  .false./)
63 
64  !Start and stop characters
65  character(len=50), parameter :: startstop(2) = [character(len=50) :: &
66  'MHAM{', '}']
67 
68  call prg_parsing_kernel(keyvector_char,valvector_char&
69  ,keyvector_int,valvector_int,keyvector_re,valvector_re,&
70  keyvector_log,valvector_log,trim(filename),startstop)
71 
72  !Characters
73  mham%JobName = valvector_char(1)
74 
75  if(valvector_char(2) == "Dense")then
76  mham%bml_type = bml_matrix_dense
77  elseif(valvector_char(2) == "Ellpack")then
78  mham%bml_type = bml_matrix_ellpack
79  elseif(valvector_char(2) == "CSR")then
80  mham%bml_type = bml_matrix_csr
81  elseif(valvector_char(2) == "Ellblock")then
82  mham%bml_type = bml_matrix_ellblock
83  elseif(valvector_char(2) == "Ellsort")then
84  mham%bml_type = bml_matrix_ellsort
85  endif
86 
87  !Integers
88  mham%norbs = valvector_int(1)
89  mham%seed = valvector_int(2)
90 
91  !Reals
92  mham%ea = valvector_re(1)
93  mham%eb = valvector_re(2)
94  mham%dab = valvector_re(3)
95  mham%daiaj = valvector_re(4)
96  mham%dbibj = valvector_re(5)
97  mham%dec = valvector_re(6)
98  mham%rcoeff = valvector_re(7)
99 
100  !Logicals
101  mham%reshuffle = valvector_log(1)
102 
103  end subroutine prg_parse_mham
104 
118  subroutine prg_twolevel_model(ea, eb, dab, daiaj, dbibj, dec, rcoeff, reshuffle, &
119  & seed, h_bml, verbose)
120  real(dp), intent(in) :: ea, eb, dab, daiaj, dbibj, rcoeff
121  integer, intent(in) :: verbose, seed
122  integer, allocatable :: seedin(:)
123  logical, intent(in) :: reshuffle
124  type(bml_matrix_t),intent(inout) :: h_bml
125  real(dp), allocatable :: diagonal(:), row(:), rowi(:), rowj(:)
126  type(bml_matrix_t) :: ht_bml
127  integer :: norbs, i, j, ssize
128  real(dp) :: dec, dist, ran
129 
130  norbs = bml_get_n(h_bml)
131  allocate(diagonal(norbs))
132  allocate(row(norbs))
133 
134  call random_seed()
135  call random_seed(size=ssize)
136  allocate(seedin(ssize))
137  seedin = seed
138  call random_seed(put=seedin)
139 
140  do i=1,norbs
141  if(mod(i,2) == 0)then
142  call random_number(ran)
143  diagonal(i) = ea + rcoeff*(2.0_dp*ran - 1.0_dp)
144  else
145  call random_number(ran)
146  diagonal(i) = eb + rcoeff*(2.0_dp*ran - 1.0_dp)
147  endif
148  enddo
149 
150  do i=1,norbs
151  do j=1,norbs
152  if(abs(real(i-j,dp)) <= norbs/2.0d0) then
153  dist = max(abs(real(i-j,dp))- 2.0_dp,0.0_dp)
154  else
155  dist = max((-abs(real(i-j,dp))+norbs) - 2.0_dp,0.0_dp)
156  endif
157  !A-A type
158  if((mod(i,2) .ne. 0) .and. (mod(j,2) .ne. 0))then
159  call random_number(ran)
160  row(j) = (daiaj + rcoeff*(2.0_dp*ran - 1.0_dp))*exp(dec*dist)
161  !A-B type
162  elseif((mod(i,2) == 0) .and. (mod(j,2) == 0))then
163  call random_number(ran)
164  row(j) = (dbibj + rcoeff*(2.0_dp*ran - 1.0_dp))*exp(dec*dist)
165  !B-B type
166  else
167  call random_number(ran)
168  row(j) = (dab + rcoeff*(2.0_dp*ran - 1.0_dp))*exp(dec*dist)
169  endif
170  ! write(*,*)i,j,row(j),mod(i,2),mod(j,2),abs(real(i-j,dp)+norbs),abs(real(i-j,dp)+norbs)
171 
172  enddo
173  call bml_set_row(h_bml,i,row)
174  enddo
175 
176  call bml_set_diagonal(h_bml,diagonal)
177 
178  !Symmetrization
179  call bml_copy_new(h_bml,ht_bml)
180  call bml_transpose(h_bml,ht_bml)
181  call bml_print_matrix("h_bml",h_bml,0,10,0,10)
182  call bml_print_matrix("ht_bml",ht_bml,0,10,0,10)
183  call bml_add(h_bml,ht_bml,0.5d0,0.5d0,0.0d0)
184 
185  if(reshuffle)then
186  allocate(rowj(norbs))
187  allocate(rowi(norbs))
188  do i=1,norbs
189  call random_number(ran)
190  j = int(floor(ran*norbs+1))
191  call bml_get_row(h_bml,i,rowi)
192  call bml_get_row(h_bml,j,rowj)
193  call bml_set_row(h_bml,i,rowj)
194  call bml_set_row(h_bml,j,rowi)
195  enddo
196  deallocate(rowi)
197  deallocate(rowj)
198  endif
199 
200  end subroutine prg_twolevel_model
201 
202 end module prg_modelham_mod

Construct a two-level model Hamiltonian.
